details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.3 Output intent - DestOutputProfileRef entry
details.description: The DestOutputProfileRef key, as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.11.5, Table 401, shall not be present in any output intent dictionary.

rule.description: The DestOutputProfileRef key, as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.11.5, Table 401, shall not be present in any output intent dictionary.

error.message: The output intent dictionary contains forbidden entry DestOutputProfileRef
